title: New: Blaue Blume – Lost Sons of Boys
content:
Copenhagen quartet Blaue Blume impressed with a trio of tracks last year, that culminated in them making a couple of successful trips over to the UK for shows.

With their first movement in 2014, the group have unveiled new track, Lost Sons of Boys, lifted from a recent recording session that spawned a host of new material. As dark and at times foreboding as previous outings, there’s a fantastic build to it, one that’s echoed in the live performance.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
